DOC.detailed_description: This study Phase I , open-label , single-dose pharmacokinetic study healthy adult male female subject . Eligible subject assign one four group base body mass index total body weight . Subjects receive single dose telavancin depend subject 's group 1-hour intravenous infusion . Serial blood urine sample collect 12 hour determine serum urinary pharmacokinetics telavancin . Subjects return blood urine sample collection 24 48 hour . Safety evaluation assess throughout study include physical examination , vital sign monitoring , clinical laboratory test , monitor adverse event , marker kidney injury .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult subject , 18 50 year Nonsmokers within last 1 year Weight > 110 lbs History significant hypersensitivity reaction intolerance telavancin Aspartate alanine aminotransferase > 1.5 time upper limit normal Estimated creatinine clearance < 60 mL/minute serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL Female subject pregnant breast feed History alcohol substance abuse dependence within last 1 year Use prescription nonprescription drug ( unless hormonal contraceptive ) within 7 14 day prior telavancin administration Participation clinical trial within last 30 day Donated blood ( > 500 mL ) within last 56 day
